channel.title: How do i spawn monsters on testscape?
channel.description: What's in game command on testscape to spawn monsters? Pls Answer

item.title: How do i spawn monsters on testscape?
item.dc:creator: @dnsi dnsi
item.description:
@dnsi wrote:

Just add a monster that has HP into the autospawn file. Look in the NPC.cfg for NPCs with HP.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i spawn monsters on testscape?

item.title: How do i spawn monsters on testscape?
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Yes there is It depends on what source your using though. If your an Admin (Go to source folder > character > your name > change rights to 2 [ to become one ]
then you just click on where the music thing is in the original one and spwn monsters.

=\ if you do it to much it will lag out the server so dont do it to much…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i spawn monsters on testscape?

item.title: How do i spawn monsters on testscape?
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

::npc, or if you want more technical stuff, you go into autospawn, then copy a npc on there, then change npc id to whatever you want.

Then set the coords you want it to spawn at.

~Sebo

Read full topic
